name: CLDeviceOrientation
desc: Constants indicating the physical orientation of the device.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The orientation is currently not known.

items.name: case portrait
items.desc: The device is in portrait mode, with the device held upright and the home button at the bottom.

items.name: case portraitUpsideDown
items.desc: The device is in portrait mode but upside down, with the device held upright and the home button at the top.

items.name: case landscapeLeft
items.desc: The device is in landscape mode, with the device held upright and the home button on the right side.

items.name: case landscapeRight
items.desc: The device is in landscape mode, with the device held upright and the home button on the left side.

items.name: case faceUp
items.desc: The device is held parallel to the ground with the screen facing upwards.

items.name: case faceDown
items.desc: The device is held parallel to the ground with the screen facing downwards.
